API Changes from EA17 Rich Client

  • General
  • Java
  • Components

General

Unknown attributes on components are no longer sent to the client component tree. Replacement functionality for associating additional client-side data with components will be provided at a later date.

Java

All of the rich client EA17 public APIs have been removed (with the exception of the component APIs). Many of the public APIs that were exposed in EA17 were not of interest to clients and should never have been included in the API distribution. Some APIs which clients may have been using include:

  • ModelHandler: This API was used in conjunction with the "virtualized tree" functionality. Clients should now use the af:tree component instead, which automatically handles disclosure changes.
  • FlattenedTreeCollectionModel: This API was also part of the virtualized tree functionality. Use af:tree with your preferred choice of TreeModel instead.
  • RichRenderUtils.addScript(): Se ExtendedRenderKitService.addScript().
If you have dependencies on other Java APIs which have been removed since EA17, please use the ADF Faces forums to let us know your requirements.

Components

Global Component Changes

The following changes apply to all components.

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
enabled disabled disabled defaults to false
height n/a use css and the inlineStyle or styleClass attribute
left n/a use css and the inlineStyle or styleClass attribute
position n/a use css and the inlineStyle or styleClass attribute
top n/a use css and the inlineStyle or styleClass attribute
width n/a use css and the inlineStyle or styleClass attribute

commandButton

Component Name:

  • EA17: commandButton
  • Current: commandButton

Note that the default postback behavior has changed since EA17. In EA17, commandButtons performed rich postbacks only when a server-side action or action listener was specified. Now, the commandButton matches the ADF Faces 10.1.3 postback behavior. That is, a non-rich postback occurs regardless of whether a server-side action or action listener is specified. To perform a rich/partial postback, the partialSubmit attribute must be set to "true". The postback can be suppressed altogether by calling ActionEvent.cancelDefaultAction() from a client-side action listener.

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
enablePageProcessingIndicator n/a Page processing feedback has temporarily been removed until we can review APIs/design for BLAF+ compliance.
label text Trivial rename, functionality is unchanged.

commandHidden

Component Name:

  • EA17: commandHidden
  • Current: n/a

The commandHidden was provided in our early access releases as a way to propagate events (such as selection change events) to the server. We are now moving towards a strategy where events are automatically propagated from the client to the server. As such, the commandHidden component has been removed. If you have requirements that are not met by our current event propagation strategy, please log an enhancement request against ADF Faces describing your use case and requirements.

commandLink

Component Name:

  • EA17: commandLink
  • Current: commandLink

Note that the default postback behavior has changed since EA17. In EA17, commandLinks performed rich postbacks only when a server-side action or action listener was specified. Now, the commandLink matches the ADF Faces 10.1.3 postback behavior. That is, a non-rich postback occurs regardless of whether a server-side action or action listener is specified. To perform a rich/partial postback, the partialSubmit attribute must be set to "true". The postback can be suppressed altogether by calling ActionEvent.cancelDefaultAction() from a client-side action listener.

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
enablePageProcessingIndicator n/a Page processing feedback has temporarily been removed until we can review APIs/design for BLAF+ compliance.
label text Trivial rename, functionality is unchanged.

commandMenuItem

Component Name:

  • EA17: commandMenuItem
  • Current: commandMenuItem

Note that the default postback behavior has changed since EA17. In EA17, commandMenuItems performed rich postbacks only when a server-side action or action listener was specified. Now, the commandMenuItem performs a rich postback regardless of whether a server-side action or action listener is specified. Note that this behavior differs from other command components such as commandButton or commandLink, which perform non-rich postbacks by default. To perform a non-rich postback from a commandMenuItem, the partialSubmit attribute must be set to "false". The postback can be suppressed altogether by calling ActionEvent.cancelDefaultAction() from a client-side action listener.

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
enablePageProcessingIndicator n/a Page processing feedback has temporarily been removed until we can review APIs/design for BLAF+ compliance.
imageURI icon Trivial rename, functionality is unchanged.
label text Trivial rename, functionality is unchanged.

commandToolbarButton

Component Name:

  • EA17: commandToolbarButton
  • Current: commandToolbarButton

Note that the default postback behavior has changed since EA17. In EA17, commandToolbarButtons performed rich postbacks only when a server-side action or action listener was specified. Now, the commandToolbarButton performs a rich postback regardless of whether a server-side action or action listener is specified. Note that this behavior differs from other command components such as commandButton or commandLink, which perform non-rich postbacks by default. To perform a non-rich postback from a commandToolbarButton, the partialSubmit attribute must be set to "false". The postback can be suppressed altogether by calling ActionEvent.cancelDefaultAction() from a client-side action listener.

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
n/a actionDelivery Allows the popup to be launched from button instead of just the popup icon button when set to none.
enablePageProcessingIndicator n/a Page processing feedback has temporarily been removed until we can review APIs/design for BLAF+ compliance.
imageDepressedURI depressedIcon Trivial rename, functionality is unchanged.
imageHeight n/a At the moment, image width and height is fixed at 16 by 16 pixels. These dimensions will be made skinnable. If finer control is required, we will consider adding other mechanisms for specifying the icon dimensions.
imageHoverURI hoverIcon Trivial rename, functionality is unchanged.
imageURI icon Trivial rename, functionality is unchanged.
imageWidth n/a At the moment, image width and height is fixed at 16 by 16 pixels. These dimensions will be made skinnable. If finer control is required, we will consider adding other mechanisms for specifying the icon dimensions.
label text Trivial rename, functionality is unchanged.
menuEnabled n/a This functionality has been removed pending review of BLAF+ functionality.
showMenuFromAll n/a This functionality has been removed pending review of BLAF+ functionality.

Changed Facets:

EA17 Current Notes
menu popup Trivial rename, functionality is unchanged.

document

Component Name:

  • EA17: document
  • Current: document

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
autoForm n/a Use af:form instead.
styleSheet n/a Use the ADF Faces skinning architecture to apply custom styles.

inputColor

Component Name:

  • EA17: inputColor
  • Current: inputColor

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
(n/a) colorData If chooseId attribute is set, this attribute is ignored. Otherwise it is used to specify the colorData attribute of the popup chooseColor provided by the inputColor.
(n/a) customColorData If chooseId attribute is set, this attribute is ignored. Otherwise it is used to specify the customColorData attribute of the popup chooseColor provided by the inputColor.
(n/a) defaultColor If chooseId attribute is set, this attribute is ignored. Otherwise it is used to specify the defaultColor attribute of the popup chooseColor provided by the inputColor.
(n/a) width If chooseId attribute is set, this attribute is ignored. Otherwise it is used to specify the width attribute of the popup chooseColor provided by the inputColor.

inputText

Component Name:

  • EA17: inputText
  • Current: inputText

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
maxLength maximumLength Trivial rename, functionality is unchanged.
size columns Trivial rename, functionality is unchanged.

menu

Component Name:

  • EA17: menu
  • Before JM5: panelMenu
  • JM5 onwards: menu

As of JM5, the panelMenu component has been renamed back to menu.Note that when a menu is nested within a menuBar or another menu, the contents of the nested menu are displayed in as a "popup" submenu.

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
imageURI icon Trivial rename, functionality is unchanged.
label text Trivial rename, functionality is unchanged.

menuBar

Component Name:

  • EA17: menuBar
  • Before JM5: menubar
  • JM5 onwards: menubar

As of JM5, the panelMenuBar component has been renamed to menubar. Note that when a menu is nested within a menubar, the contents of the nested menu are displayed in as a "popup" submenu.

Note that "panelMenuBar" component has been renamed to "menubar" as part of the component renaming project.

menuPopup

Component Name:

  • EA17: menuPopup
  • Current: popup

The "menuPopup" component has been replaced with a generic "popup" container. Currently, the primary use of the popup component is for display of context menus. This can be achieved by emedding a panelMenu inside of a popup component and then setting the contextMenuId on the associated tree or table component. In the future, the popup component will be used for display of other types of content, such as inline windows and selectors.

menuSeparator

Component Name:

  • EA17: menuSeparator
  • Current: n/a

Use the af:group component to create groups of menu items and toolbar buttons. Separators will be rendered as appropriate to separate the groups.

objectImage

Component Name:

  • EA17: objectImage
  • Current: objectImage

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
(none) visible the visibility of the component. If it is "false", the component will be hidden on the client. Unlike "rendered", this does not affect the lifecycle on the server - the component may have its bindings executed, etc. - and the visibility of the component can be toggled on and off on the client, or toggled with PPR. When "rendered" is false, the component will not in any way be rendered, and cannot be made visible on the client.
(none) inlineStyle Specifies CSS styles to use for this component.
(none) longDescURL an URL that specifies a link to a long description of the image. This description should supplement the short description.
(none) imageMapType If a server-side image map is desired, specify "server" and place inside a CoreGoLink component. The acceptable values are "server" or "none"; defaults to "none".
alt shortDesc same attribute, changed to be the same as the core implementation

objectProcessingIndicator

Component Name:

  • EA17: objectProcessingIndicator
  • Current: n/a

This functionality (and component) has been removed pending review of BLAF+ processing feedback designs.

objectSeperator

Component Name:

  • EA17: objectSeperator
  • Current: objectSeperator

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
(none) shortDesc The short description of the component. This text is commonly used by user agents to display tooltip help text.
(none) inlineStyle Specifies CSS styles to use for this component.
(none) styleClass Specified the CSS style class to use for this component.
enabled (removed) Obsolete: no replacement. This is a simple seperator and therefore has no enabling or disabling associated with it.
orientation (removed) Obsolete: no replacement. This is now strictly a horizontal seperator. Vertical Seperators in toolbars and menus will be handled using another mechanism.

panelBorder

Component Name:

  • EA17: panelBorder
  • Current: panelBorder

Changed Facets:

EA17 Current Notes
center n/a For consistentcy with the ADF Faces panelBorder API, components which were previously added to the "center" facet should now be added as indexed children of the panelBorder. The last indexed child will be stretched to fill remaining vertical space.
north top Renamed for consistency with existing ADF Faces API
south bottom Renamed for consistency with existing ADF Faces API
west left (or start) Renamed for consistency with existing ADF Faces API
east right (or end) Renamed for consistency with existing ADF Faces API

panelGrouplLayout

Component Name:

  • EA17: panelGrouplLayout
  • Current: panelGrouplLayout

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
type layout Renamed for consistency with existing ADF Faces API

panelToolbar

Component Name:

  • EA17: panelToolbar
  • Before JM5: panelToolbar
  • JM5 onwards: toolbar

As of JM5, the panelToolbar component has been renamed to toolbar.

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
collapsible n/a This attribute was never implemented and has been removed from the public API.
repositionable n/a This attribute was never implemented and has been removed from the public API.

selectItem

Component Name:

  • EA17: selectItem
  • Current: selectItem

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
styleClass n/a no longer supported
visible n/a no longer supported

Additional Notes:

  • there is no longer a component for a selectItem on the client, it is now treated like data.

selectOneChoice

Component Name:

  • EA17: selectOneChoice
  • Current: selectOneChoice

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
n/a mode This new attribute accepts two values: "default" and "compact". When set to "compact", selectOneChoice hides its selected value box and shows only a small drop down icon, and the popup list has different look and feel. Otherwise, selectOneChoice works exactly the same way as before.

separator

Component Name:

  • EA17: seaparator
  • Current: objectSeparator, group

Use af:objectSeparator to add a separator to the page. Use af:group to group items in menus/toolbars.

showDetail

Component Name:

  • EA17: showDetail
  • Current: showDetail

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
(none) shortDesc The short description of the component. This text is commonly used by user agents to display tooltip help text.
(none) clientBehaviors Client behavior
(none) inlineStyle Specifies CSS styles to use for this component.
(none) disclosedText the text to display when the children are disclosed. If this attribute is set and the undisclosedText attribute is not set, this text will be displayed for both the disclosed state AND the undisclosed state.
(none) undisclosedText the text to display when the children are undisclosed. If this attribute is set and the disclosedText attribute is not set, this text will be displayed for both the disclosed state AND the undisclosed state.
label (removed) Obsolete: see diclosedText and undisclosedText attributes

Changed Facets:

EA17 Current Notes
none Prompt Component rendered next to the hide or show icon. If this facet is present, this will be used instead of the disclosedText and undisclosedText attributes.

showDetailItem

Component Name:

  • EA17: showDetailItem
  • Current: showDetailItem

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
(none) shortDesc The short description of the component. This text is commonly used by user agents to display tooltip help text.
(none) inlineStyle Specifies CSS styles to use for this component.
label text changed to be consistant with core
(none) flex a non-negative integer that indicates the flexibility of this component in its container. If the container supports it, flex is used to determine how space is distributed among its children. Components with larger flex values will be made larger than components with lower flex values. This is done so at the ratio determined by the flex of each of the two components. The actual value is only relevant if there are other flexible components (components with flex values larger than zero) within the same container.

Changed Facets:

EA17 Current Notes
status toolbar same functionality, simply renamed to comply with BLAF+ specs better

Additional Notes:

  • todo

showDetailTreeNode

  • EA17: showDetailTreeNode
  • Current: n/a

Use af:tree and af:treeTable for hierarchical display of TreeModel data.

  • EA17: table
  • Current: table

Changed Attributes:

EA17 Current Notes
disclosureListener rowDisclosureListener
disclosureState disclosedRowKeys
minVirualizedSize n/a All tables are now virtualized
selectionState selectedRowKeys
targetRowKey n/a Currency is established in the table in order to indicate which row is the target of the context menu operation.
